Name: Akitu Sulcus
Namesake: Where Marduk's statue was carried each year.

Name: Arbela Sulcus
Namesake: Assyrian town where Ishtar was worshipped.

Name: Bubastis Sulci
Namesake: Town in Egypt where Bast was worshipped.

Name: Dukug Sulcus
Namesake: Sumerian holy cosmic chamber of the gods.

Name: Erech Sulcus
Namesake: Akkadian town that was built by Marduk.

Name: Harpagia Sulcus
Namesake: Greek; where Ganymede was abducted an eagle.

Name: Mysia Sulci
Namesake: Greek; where Ganymede was abducted by an eagle.

Name: Philae Sulcus
Namesake: Temple that was the chief sanctuary of Isis.

Name: Ur Sulcus
Namesake: Ancient Sumerian seat of moon worship.
